none: Inferna - Facing A Future Of Terror
Inferna - Facing A Future Of Terror

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on December 13, 2023 Description from Terminal Escape:
 Fierce doesn't even begin to describe INFERNA. Their raw, bombastic hardcore is the embodiment of sonic desperation and this is how punk is supposed to fukkn feel. I don't feel dirty when I listen to INFERNA - I feel heard. FACING A FUTURE OF TERROR
